column1: # Input file format for LASDiA software
# Use the hash for the comments

column5: Description
Path sample file
Path background file
Path for the XYZ file
Path molecule parameters file
Minimum Q value in data interpolation waves
Maximum Q value in data interpolation waves
Qmax for all integration operations (FT, and valid S(Q) etc.)
Smoothing factor for cubic spline smoothing of S(Q) (Larger is smoother--usually between 1 and 3)
Exponential damping factor == A*Qmax^2,  Warren says to try to keep <1.5, Others say set to ln(10)=2.3
Scale factor initial value
Density initial value
Number of iteration for F© optimization
The distance below which no peaks in F(r) may occur
Scale factor minimum value for the minimization
Scale factor maximum  value for the minimization
Scale factor step value for the minimization
Density minimum value for the minimization
Density maximum  value for the minimization
Density step value for the minimization
